biotools.summary: Server for the calculation of direct and indirect readout energy Z-scores which estimate the degree of sequence specificity of the protein-DNA complex. It can be useful for checking the quality of protein-DNA interactions in three dimensional (3D) structures.

bioschemas.name: ReadOut
bioschemas.summary: Server for the calculation of direct and indirect readout energy Z-scores which estimate the degree of sequence specificity of the protein-DNA complex. It can be useful for checking the quality of protein-DNA interactions in three dimensional (3D) structures.
